name: Corsario - Demo
description:
Cosario follows a small group of pirates led by their daring Captain and heedful First Mate (Plus a heedless Gunner and bold Sailing Master), with only a small fighting force as their boarding party and main offense.  Stuck in the middle of islands of the Carribean, the fleets of the English, other Pirates, and some defenseless sugar trade ships, the crew can ask one question: Where to, Captain?

This demo opens on the crew lamenting their Captain being gone and losing track of the English Fleet, before the Captain meets back up with the crew. Boarding their ship, they sail across a small series of islands, fighting several foes along the way (And perhaps finding a secret island) before being tracked down by none other than the Governer of the local islands, a dangerous foe. With the fall of the Governer, the crew may rest easy, if temporarily. However, the fall of the Governer may not be one the enemy takes lightly...

This Demo covers a prototype of the game, including the map, fights and character dialogue until the first, early, boss fight.

Release date TBD, likely 9th December.

Character profiles made on: http://dmheroes.com/
